I Wonder

01 July 2006

I wonder if all camp sites in Germany have olympic size swimming pools. This one does anyway (and a full size astro pitch).

We were out on the town until about 6 so I only did a warm up to clear the head this morning; 600m at a snail's pace. Maybe tomorrow I'll do a full session, but that'll depend on the post-match atmosphere in town later. Olé Olé from Berlin.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
